price: 44. Waxay leedahay toddoba Albaabood, albaab walbaa waxaa ahaan qayb gaar ah oo ka mid ah (ehlu Naarka).
arabic: لَهَا سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡوَٰبٖ لِّكُلِّ بَابٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ جُزۡءٞ مَّقۡسُومٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lahā sabʿatu abwābin likulli bābin min'hum juz'on maqsūmun
